swipes.notes: Massive social proof in hook (171.9k builders, $1B). Emoji-heavy format. Clear value props with checkmarks. Free trial CTA.

swipes.headline: Private session at Acquisition.com's Vegas HQ
swipes.primaryText:
We're hosting a private session at Acquisition.com's Las Vegas HQ to show entrepreneurs the exact methods we use to scale businesses.

Want to be in the room?

Click below to see if you're a fit.
swipes.cta: Learn How to Scale Your Business
swipes.notes: Exclusivity angle (private session, Vegas HQ). Qualifying language (see if you're a fit). Short, direct copy.
swipes.whyItWorks: Creates exclusivity and scarcity. Positions as invitation not pitch. Qualification = premium positioning.

swipes.headline: Are you struggling to scale?
swipes.primaryText:
**Are you struggling to scale?**

To scale, you need one of these three things:
1. Better advertising and sales processes to get more customers
2. Increased customer value to afford more advertising and sales
3. More people to help keep up with demand

The good news? We've designed a Scaling Roadmap that teaches how to solve these constraints.

And we've personalized it for your business.

We're confident it can help you break through to the next level.

Just answer a few questions and we'll send it to you for free.
swipes.notes: Problem-aware hook. Framework presentation (3 things). Personalization angle. Free lead magnet.
swipes.whyItWorks: Opens with pain point. Provides framework = authority. Personalized = high perceived value.

swipes.headline: Investors don't buy businesses with key man risk
swipes.primaryText:
Here's a hard truth: investors don't buy businesses that can't survive without the founder.

It doesn't matter how much revenue you do.

If every decision, every client, and every fire comes back to you, the value of your company is close to zero.

That's key man risk. And until you solve it, you don't have an asset. You have a liability.

We've built systems inside our portfolio companies to remove founder dependency and create businesses that actually scale‚Ä¶ and sell.

That's what we teach, hands-on, at our Scaling Workshop in Vegas.

If you want to build something that outlives you, click below and let's talk.
swipes.cta: Learn How to Scale Your Business
swipes.notes: Hard truth opening = pattern interrupt. Contrarian take. Asset vs liability reframe. Future-pacing (outlives you).
swipes.whyItWorks: Challenges assumption about revenue. Creates urgency around exit strategy. Positions workshop as solution.

swipes.headline: Get started for FREE üî• Unlock the 14-Day Trial
swipes.primaryText:
üëâ Join 171.9k community builders collectively earning over $1 billion per year on the Skool platform TODAY.

What you get when you sign up:
‚úÖ Community software: Your own Skool with community, classroom, calendar, map, and more
‚úÖ Access to Skoolers: A thriving community of creators and entrepreneurs openly sharing what works
‚úÖ Training: Skool 101, Alex Hormozi's $100M Money Models training, plus weekly updates

After your trial, it's just $9/month for Hobby or $99/month for Premium.
swipes.notes: Clear feature stack with checkmarks. Price anchoring ($9 and $99). Hormozi name drop for credibility.
swipes.whyItWorks: Shows exactly what you get. Low entry price reduces friction. Established authority association.

swipes.headline: Tony Robbins X Alex Hormozi - What does the mentor's mentor say?
swipes.primaryText:
Tony Robbins X Alex Hormozi - What does the mentors, mentors, mentor‚Ä¶

Say about setting goals?

Tony Robbins, who recently sat down to give some advice or mentorship to Alex Hormozi‚Ä¶ had a mentor.

Jim Rohn.

Who also had a mentor, named Mr Shoaf.

Mr Shoaf, said to Jim Rohn:
"Set the kind of goals that would make something of you to achieve them."

There is nothing better than a goal that requires you to Self-Actualize.

This is the reason why setting a goal of hitting $20K a month as a closer‚Ä¶

Is simply not what I teach inside my Unicorn Closer Mastermind.

Set goals, like earning $100K a month in commissions, like 5 Unicorn Closers have already achieved‚Ä¶

Because of who it requires you to become in the process.

This is Self-Actualized Selling.
swipes.notes: Authority stacking (Robbins ‚Üí Hormozi ‚Üí Rohn ‚Üí Shoaf). Aspirational identity play. Contrarian goal-setting angle.
swipes.whyItWorks: Borrowed authority from big names. Challenges conventional goals. Identity-based transformation sell.

swipes.primaryText:

Start your 14-day free trial now
swipes.notes: Speed promise (90 seconds). Multiple growth paths listed. Video format for demo potential.

swipes.headline: Community software with classroom, calendar, map & more

swipes.headline: Better advertising, customer value, or more people
swipes.primaryText:
To scale, you need one of these three things:

1. Better advertising and sales processes to get more customers
2. Increased customer value to afford more advertising and sales
3. More people to help keep up with demand

The good news? We've designed a Scaling Roadmap that teaches how to solve these constraints.
swipes.notes: Framework ad - 3 pillars of scaling. Educational approach. Lead magnet offer.
swipes.whyItWorks: Framework = instant authority. Diagnoses problem. Free roadmap is low-friction entry.

swipes.headline: $9/month or $99/month after trial
swipes.primaryText:
After your trial, it's just $9/month for Hobby or $99/month for Premium.

What you get when you sign up:

swipes.whyItWorks: Transparency builds trust. $9 is impulse-buy territory. Options = control for buyer.
